snippet: Jonathan Lisecki discusses “Gayby,” his short film that grew up into a feature about a gay man, his straight best friend and their quest to make a baby together.
abstract: Jonathan Lisecki, director of film Gayby, shares his thoughts on gay stereotypes, his sense of humor and his inspirations.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Lisecki discusses “Gayby,” his short film that grew up into a feature about a gay man, his straight best friend and their quest to make a baby together.

headline.main: Making a Comedy About Friends Making Babies
headline.print_headline: Making a Comedy About Friends Making Babies
